summary: Along with setting the Falmer Helmet to Heavy Armor, including it in the list of items affected by the Steel Smithing Perk, setting both stats identical to the other Falmer armor pieces, this modifies the Falmer Helmet so it can no longer be worn at the same time as a Circlet for a bugged bonus to Alchemy, nor with any mask.
descriptionHtml:
_____________________________________

Along with setting the [b]Falmer Helmet[/b] to [b]Heavy Armor[/b], including it in the list of items affected by the [b]Steel Smithing Perk[/b], setting both stats identical to the other [b]Falmer[/b] armor pieces, this modifies the [b]Falmer Helmet[/b] so it can no longer be worn at the same time as a [b]Circlet[/b] for a bugged bonus to [b]Alchemy[/b], nor with any mask.

_____________________________________

Created with the [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Tes5Mod:SkyEdit]SkyEdit[/url] modding tool.
_____________________________________

*This mod is probably made redundant with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4719]Weapons and Armor Fixes by Headbomb[/url]
author: BigMill
